purpose: The email announces the call for papers (CFP) for the 12th International Conference on Software Defined Systems (SDS2025), which will take place in Lyon, France from December 2-5, 2025. It invites researchers, engineers, and practitioners to submit high-quality research and case studies on various topics related to software-defined systems. The conference aims to explore the foundations, architectures, challenges, and innovations in software-defined environments, fostering interdisciplinary dialogue and collaboration. Key dates for submissions and notifications are provided, along with guidelines for manuscript preparation and submission.

evidence_sentences: The 12th International Conference on Software Defined Systems (SDS2025)
SDS 2025 aims to stimulate cross-disciplinary dialogue and foster collaborations that bridge networking, systems, security, cloud computing, artificial intelligence, and beyond.
We welcome high-quality research and case studies in, but not limited to, the following areas:
Accepted papers will be published in the conference proceedings and made accessible through major digital libraries.
All submissions are peer-reviewed by at least two reviewers.
